title: Coronavirus is growing exponentially — here’s what the numbers mean
description: You may have seen a version of the infographic (below) that explains the potential impact of social distancing. It nicely illustrates that reducing the total number of disease-spreading contacts each infected person has can have a dramatic effect on the total…
